channel.title: News on Kosuke Takahashi, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in News on Kosuke Takahashi, Ph.D.

item.title: 1. JOB CHANGE
item.description: I changed my job from a researcher at NTT Media Intelligence Laboratories to a software engineer at UMITRON.

item.title: 2. RESEARCH PAPER
item.description: Our new paper ``Easy Extrinsic Calibration of VR System and Multi-Camera based Marker-less Motion Capture System’’ was accepted to ISMAR 2019 poster paper.

item.title: 3. Invited Talk
item.description: I had a tutorial lecture about camera calibration at SSII 2019. The lecture slide is here.
